channel.title: Tutorials and resources
channel.description:
Tutorials: - [yakman] BCEL Tutorial: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,160681.0.html - [the bank] Making a loader (URL & Jar): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,294949.0.html - [the bank] Bytecode, Instructions & an Introduction to Client Hacking: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,293125.0.html - [the bank] All About Accessor Methods & Interfaces: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,293071.0.html - [NOURLOL] The client as an applet, AppletStub to the rescue!: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,11062.0.html - [NOURLOL] The new "signlink" objects: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,11057.0.html - [Freddy1990] Parsing client params: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,335547.0.html - [imafatmess] Ultimate BCEL tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=216985.0 - [the bank] Making a loader v2: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,388301.0.html - [BAsh] How to Hack the Client's Canvas: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,396252.0.html
You can find more tutorials on RS-Hacking.com here: http://rs-hacking.com/index.php/board,14.0.html (Requires registration)
Sources: - [quaters] Instruction Searcher: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,310539.0.html - [Speljohan] Useful BCEL Method (FieldScanner): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,235485.0.html - [_cake] A fun way to find if a class has the 'readUnsignedShort' method: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,213043.0.html - [KryptoN_] Show and Tell (Updater Style!): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,167215.0.html - [Fasga] Loading RS Classes (ASM, Javassist, and BCEL): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,155681.0.html - [pplsuqbawlz] String Decoder: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,28376.0.html - [the bank] Simple Updater: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,288851.0.html - [yakman] Camera Man (hacked client): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,255496.0.html - [Evil_] Bot: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,232994.0.html - [marluxia] OCR Autoresponder: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,267099.0.html - [Fasga] ASM Updater: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,257519.0.html - [shangtsung] Unfinished Reflection Bot: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,239203.0.html - [pplsuqbawlz] Updater: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,100883.0.html - [unlimitedorb] RuneGrail: A learning experience (bot): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,228339.0.html - [frank_] Updater: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,183104.0.html - [quaters] Cache Packer/Unpacker: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,178273.0.html - [yakman] hp announcer 8.6.07 [bcel]: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,154363.0.html - [pplzsuqbawlz] Basic Undetected Loader: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,39100.0.html - [pplzsuqbawlz] PSBL's Loader: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,97999.0.html - [ownagesbot] [Undetectable loader] (Only the loader): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,55301.0.html
Tools: - [cartridges] Cached client extractor: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,328972.0.html - [the bank] Reflection explorer: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,299985.0.html - [Ollie] Pattern Finder: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,340450.0.html
Info: - [_cake] Simple method to find MutableString & Decompressor: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,213398.0.html - [regecks`] Java Agents and Browser Applets: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,128629.0.html - [pplsuqbawlz] Big'ol tip on mouse detection: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,39270.0.html
Other: - [regecks`] PHP getClientVersion(): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,100433.0.html - [Cowie`] Client version: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,334712.0.html - [Ollie] SecurityManager Dump: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,338554.0.html
Client builds & updater logs:

item.title: Tutorials and resources
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

Tutorials:

  • [yakman] BCEL Tutorial: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,160681.0.html
  • [the bank] Making a loader (URL & Jar): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,294949.0.html
  • [the bank] Bytecode, Instructions & an Introduction to Client Hacking: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,293125.0.html
  • [the bank] All About Accessor Methods & Interfaces: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,293071.0.html
  • [NOURLOL] The client as an applet, AppletStub to the rescue!: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,11062.0.html
  • [NOURLOL] The new “signlink” objects: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,11057.0.html
  • [Freddy1990] Parsing client params: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,335547.0.html
  • [imafatmess] Ultimate BCEL tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=216985.0
  • [the bank] Making a loader v2: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,388301.0.html
  • [BAsh] How to Hack the Client’s Canvas: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,396252.0.html

You can find more tutorials on RS-Hacking.com here: http://rs-hacking.com/index.php/board,14.0.html (Requires registration)

Sources:

  • [quaters] Instruction Searcher: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,310539.0.html
  • [Speljohan] Useful BCEL Method (FieldScanner): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,235485.0.html
  • [_cake] A fun way to find if a class has the ‘readUnsignedShort’ method: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,213043.0.html
  • [KryptoN_] Show and Tell (Updater Style!): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,167215.0.html
  • [Fasga] Loading RS Classes (ASM, Javassist, and BCEL): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,155681.0.html
  • [pplsuqbawlz] String Decoder: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,28376.0.html
  • [the bank] Simple Updater: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,288851.0.html
  • [yakman] Camera Man (hacked client): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,255496.0.html
  • [Evil_] Bot: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,232994.0.html
  • [marluxia] OCR Autoresponder: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,267099.0.html
  • [Fasga] ASM Updater: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,257519.0.html
  • [shangtsung] Unfinished Reflection Bot: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,239203.0.html
  • [pplsuqbawlz] Updater: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,100883.0.html
  • [unlimitedorb] RuneGrail: A learning experience (bot): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,228339.0.html
  • [frank_] Updater: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,183104.0.html
  • [quaters] Cache Packer/Unpacker: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,178273.0.html
  • [yakman] hp announcer 8.6.07 [bcel]: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,154363.0.html
  • [pplzsuqbawlz] Basic Undetected Loader: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,39100.0.html
  • [pplzsuqbawlz] PSBL’s Loader: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,97999.0.html
  • [ownagesbot] [Undetectable loader] (Only the loader): http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,55301.0.html

Tools:

  • [cartridges] Cached client extractor: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,328972.0.html
  • [the bank] Reflection explorer: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,299985.0.html
  • [Ollie] Pattern Finder: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,340450.0.html

Info:

  • [_cake] Simple method to find MutableString & Decompressor: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,213398.0.html
  • [regecks`] Java Agents and Browser Applets: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,128629.0.html
  • [pplsuqbawlz] Big’ol tip on mouse detection: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,39270.0.html

Other:
